Html:
Hi,

How can I create an empty window style? I have tried to download the FirstFloor.ModernUI.WPF4 from Download section, compiled and imported the DLL file into my project already, but it still didn't work.

Can anyone guide me step-by-step on how to achieve this?

Thanks!
Seang

Create a ModernUI app as outlined in the documentation. Make sure you follow the steps specific for WPF4.

Then set the style of the MainWindow.xaml like so:
<mui:ModernWindow ... Style="{StaticResource EmptyWindow}" />
Important: I just checked in ModernWindow style updates for WPF4. These updates are not released yet, you need to compile the source yourself for now. I'm hoping to create a new release soon.
